function.name: nunit
function.description: Adds a [build step](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?NUnit) running NUnit tests @see NUnitStep

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: toolPath
param.description: A path to NUnit console tool including the file name

param.name: includeTests
param.description: Comma- or newline-separated list of .NET assemblies where the NUnit tests are specified relative to the checkout directory. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: excludeTests
param.description: Comma- or newline-separated list of .NET assemblies which should be excluded from the list of found assemblies to test.

param.name: includeCategories
param.description: Comma- or newline-separated list of NUnit categories. [Category expressions](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?TeamCity+NUnit+Test+Launcher#TeamCityNUnitTestLauncher-CategoryExpression) are supported as well.

param.name: excludeCategories
param.description: Comma- or newline-separated list of NUnit categories which should be excluded. [Category expressions](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?TeamCity+NUnit+Test+Launcher#TeamCityNUnitTestLauncher-CategoryExpression) are supported as well.

param.name: teamcity.tests.runRiskGroupTestsFirst
param.description: Whether TeamCity should run recently failed tests first to reduce test feedback

param.name: useProjectFile
param.description: Whether TeamCity should create *.nunit test project files for each test assemblies location

param.name: arguments
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for nunit console.

example.description: Runs [NUnit](https://nunit.org/) tests with help of the default NUnit console tool installed on the TeamCity server. Collects —Åode coverage with help of [JetBrains DotCover](https://www.jetbrains.com/dotcover/) and reports it to the TeamCity server together with the test results.
